multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: equities; AI safety regulation may pressure tech stocks in the S&P 500.

category.motivation: The article reports a new product feature rollout by OpenAI, which is a company‑specific operational update unrelated to earnings, regulatory changes, or macroeconomic data.

impact.motivation: The article concerns a product feature for a tech company and does not impact macroeconomic or market indicators covered by the node scope.

time_frame.motivation: The article reports an immediate policy change expected to take effect within the next month, directly impacting the node.

article_node.title: OpenAI: ChatGPT Parental Controls Are Coming Next Month Following Wrongful Death Lawsuit
article_node.summary: OpenAI announced that it will roll out parental controls for ChatGPT over the next month, a move prompted by a wrongful‑death lawsuit alleging the bot contributed to a teen’s suicide. The new features will let parents link accounts, set age‑appropriate models, restrict functions such as memory and chat history, and receive alerts if the child encounters distressing content. The controls aim to improve safety for users aged 13 and older while addressing concerns over the bot’s guardrails during extended conversations.
